metadata.dc:author: Szulik, D
metadata.dc:description: This article raises some questions to understand the meaning of collective memory and the process of its social construction today. The relation between memory and identity is changing due to economic and cultural globalization. Notions like time and space, that define memory change their meaning and raise new social relations.
metadata.dc:title: Ideas para pensar la memoria colectiva en la actualidad.
[Some ideas to think the collective memory at the present time].
